borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The proposed development, by reason of its scale, siting and design is considered to be harmful to the character and appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</div><div>- Policies SP2, SP4, DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020).</div>

<div>The proposed development, by reason of its excessive scale, siting and design would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of material outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy DMD6 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</div><div>- Policy DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020).</div>
description: CONSTRUCTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION.
